participant_1.name: Claire
participant_1.personality: Pragmatic and grounded, Claire values practicality over aesthetics and finds joy in the simplicity of life.
participant_1.background: i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i compete in dog agility classes.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Contemplative and introspective, Liam seeks inner peace and understanding through spiritual practices and meditation.
participant_2.background: i like meditation. i've not spoken in three months. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i'm a buddhist.
